org.easybatch.core.api.event

Interface EventManager


  • public interface EventManager
    Interface for the event manager.

    There is one local implementation included. It could also be implemented using JMS or any other distributed technology to get to know of any event happened while the job is running.

    Please note that if you implement something like a global or singleton event handler you must care for synchronized access for your self.

    Author:
    Mario Mueller (mario@xenji.com)

      • fireAfterRecordProcessing

        void fireAfterRecordProcessing(java.lang.Object record,
                             java.lang.Object processingResult)
        Called after the processing is done.

        Do not use this method to do additional work on the record or the result.

        Parameters:
        record - The record that has been processed.
        processingResult - The processing result, if any. This can be a null reference.
